verses.verse: And the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses<WH4872> in the wilderness<WH4057> of Sinai,<WH5514> in the first<WH7223> month<WH2320> of the second<WH8145> year<WH8141> after they were come<WH3318> out of the land<WH776> of Egypt,<WH4714> saying,<WH559>
Let the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> also keep<WH6213> the passover<WH6453> at his appointed<WH4150> season.<WH4150>

In the fourteenth<WH702> <WH6240> day<WH3117> of this<WH2088> month,<WH2320> at<WH996> even,<WH6153> you shall keep<WH6213> it in his appointed<WH4150> season:<WH4150> according to all<WH3605> the rites<WH2708> of it, and according to all<WH3605> the ceremonies<WH4941> thereof, shall you keep<WH6213> it.
And Moses<WH4872> spoke<WH1696> to the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> that they should keep<WH6213> the passover.<WH6453>

And they kept<WH6213> the passover<WH6453> on the fourteenth<WH702> <WH6240> day<WH3117> of the first<WH7223> month<WH2320> at<WH996> even<WH6153> in the wilderness<WH4057> of Sinai:<WH5514> according to all<WH3605> that the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses,<WH4872> so<WH3651> did<WH6213> the children<WH1121> of Israel.<WH3478>

And there were certain men,<WH582> who<WH834> were defiled<WH2931> by the dead<WH5315> body<WH5315> of a man,<WH120> that they could<WH3201> not keep<WH6213> the passover<WH6453> on that day:<WH3117> and they came<WH7126> before<WH6440> Moses<WH4872> and before<WH6440> Aaron<WH175> on that day:<WH3117>

And those<WH1992> men<WH582> said<WH559> to him, We are defiled<WH2931> by the dead<WH5315> body<WH5315> of a man:<WH120> why<WH4100> are we kept<WH1639> back,<WH1639> that we may not offer<WH7126> an offering<WH7133> of the LORD<WH3068> in his appointed<WH4150> season<WH4150> among<WH8432> the children<WH1121> of Israel?<WH3478>
And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> to them, Stand<WH5975> still, and I will hear<WH8085> what<WH4100> the LORD<WH3068> will command<WH6680> concerning you.
And the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses,<WH4872> saying,<WH559>

Speak<WH1696> to the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> saying,<WH559> If<WH3588> any<WH376> man<WH376> of you or of your posterity<WH1755> shall be unclean<WH2931> by reason of a dead<WH5315> body,<WH5315> or<WH176> be in a journey<WH1870> afar<WH7350> off, yet he shall keep<WH6213> the passover<WH6453> to the LORD.<WH3068>

The fourteenth<WH702> <WH6240> day<WH3117> of the second<WH8145> month<WH2320> at<WH996> even<WH6153> they shall keep<WH6213> it, and eat<WH398> it with unleavened<WH4682> bread and bitter<WH4844> herbs.

They shall leave<WH7604> none<WH3808> of it to the morning,<WH1242> nor<WH3808> break<WH7665> any bone<WH6106> of it: according to all<WH3605> the ordinances<WH2708> of the passover<WH6453> they shall keep<WH6213> it.

But the man<WH376> that is clean,<WH2889> and is not in a journey,<WH1870> and declines<WH2308> to keep<WH6213> the passover,<WH6453> even the same<WH1931> soul<WH5315> shall be cut<WH3772> off from among his people:<WH5971> because<WH3588> he brought<WH7126> not the offering<WH7133> of the LORD<WH3068> in his appointed<WH4150> season,<WH4150> that man<WH376> shall bear<WH5375> his sin.<WH2399>

And if<WH3588> a stranger<WH1616> shall sojourn<WH1481> among<WH854> you, and will keep<WH6213> the passover<WH6453> to the LORD;<WH3068> according to the ordinance<WH2708> of the passover,<WH6453> and according to the manner<WH4941> thereof, so<WH3651> shall he do:<WH6213> you shall have<WH1961> one<WH259> ordinance,<WH2708> both for the stranger,<WH1616> and for him that was born<WH249> in the land.<WH776>

And on the day<WH3117> that the tabernacle<WH4908> was reared<WH6965> up the cloud<WH6051> covered<WH3680> the tabernacle,<WH4908> namely, the tent<WH168> of the testimony:<WH5715> and at even<WH6153> there was on the tabernacle<WH4908> as it were the appearance<WH4758> of fire,<WH784> until<WH5704> the morning.<WH1242>
So<WH3651> it was always:<WH8548> the cloud<WH6051> covered<WH3680> it by day, and the appearance<WH4758> of fire<WH784> by night.<WH3915>

And when<WH6310> the cloud<WH6051> was taken<WH5927> up from the tabernacle,<WH168> then after<WH310> that the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> journeyed:<WH5265> and in the place<WH4725> where<WH834> the cloud<WH6051> stayed,<WH7931> there<WH8033> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> pitched<WH2583> their tents.

At<WH5921> the commandment<WH6310> of the LORD<WH3068> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> journeyed,<WH5265> and at<WH5921> the commandment<WH6310> of the LORD<WH3068> they pitched:<WH2583> as long<WH3117> as the cloud<WH6051> stayed<WH7931> on the tabernacle<WH4908> they rested<WH2583> in their tents.

And when the cloud<WH6051> tarried<WH748> long on the tabernacle<WH4908> many<WH7227> days,<WH3117> then the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> kept<WH8104> the charge<WH4931> of the LORD,<WH3068> and journeyed<WH5265> not.

And so it was, when<WH834> the cloud<WH6051> was a few<WH4557> days<WH3117> on the tabernacle;<WH4908> according<WH5921> to the commandment<WH6310> of the LORD<WH3068> they stayed<WH2583> in their tents, and according<WH5921> to the commandment<WH6310> of the LORD<WH3068> they journeyed.<WH5265>

And so it was, when<WH834> the cloud<WH6051> stayed<WH1961> from even<WH6153> to the morning,<WH1242> and that the cloud<WH6051> was taken<WH5927> up in the morning,<WH1242> then they journeyed:<WH5265> whether<WH176> it was by day<WH3119> or by night<WH3915> that the cloud<WH6051> was taken<WH5927> up, they journeyed.<WH5265>

Or whether<WH176> it were two days,<WH3117> or<WH176> a month,<WH2320> or<WH176> a year,<WH3117> that the cloud<WH6051> tarried<WH748> on the tabernacle,<WH4908> remaining<WH7931> thereon,<WH5921> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> stayed<WH2583> in their tents, and journeyed<WH5265> not: but when it was taken<WH5927> up, they journeyed.<WH5265>

At<WH5921> the commandment<WH6310> of the LORD<WH3068> they rested<WH2583> in the tents, and at<WH5921> the commandment<WH6310> of the LORD<WH3068> they journeyed:<WH5265> they kept<WH8104> the charge<WH4931> of the LORD,<WH3068> at<WH5921> the commandment<WH6310> of the LORD<WH3068> by the hand<WH3027> of Moses.<WH4872>
